9-10.name: We Hate You, Please Die.
9-10.info: Taunts the farthest Enemy each turn.

11-12.name: Tell them they're next
11-12.info: Won't deal Damage to the final Enemy in an encounter.

19-20.name: The same thing that happens to everything else.

21-22.name: 360 quickscope
21-22.info: Adds a Crit to each Ranged Attack.

23-24.name: Any Questions?
23-24.info: Shoots pumpkin bombs that deal an extra 3d6 Explosive Damage.

25-26.name: Blood and Thunder
25-26.info: Take 1d6 Health Damage to deal +3d6 Shock Damage.

27-28.name: SI VIS PACEM, PARA BELLUM
27-28.info: Gain Extra Attack if Acting Before Enemies.

29-30.name: You're breathtaking!
29-30.info: Wielder cannot be targeted on the first turn of an encounter.

31-32.name: Pass turn.
31-32.info: Wielder may Throw a grenade during the End of Turn step.

33-34.name: /am Vengeance!
33-34.info: Deals 2x Damage to Enemies adjacent to allies.

35-36.name: Roll the dice
35-36.info: If Accuracy Roll is even, 2x Damage. If Accuracy Roll is odd, half Damage.

37-38.name: One among the fence
37-38.info: Add 21 Damage if you roll 13+ on your Accuracy Roll. (1/day)

39-40.name: Don't be sorry. Be better.
39-40.info: Reroll the Badass Die once per day.

41-42.name: THE PICKLES!
41-42.info: Shoots flaming cheeseburgers that deal an extra 2d6 Incendiary Damage.

45-46.name: Extinction is the Rule
45-46.info: Teleport to any square up to 4 away when you kill an Enemy.

47-48.name: Never Fight a Knight with a Perm

49-50.name: Bye bye, little Butt Stallion!
49-50.info: Shots explode into rainbows that deal an extra 1d8 Damage.

51-52.name: Time 2 Hack
51-52.info: +4 on Interact Checks and Melee Damage while equipped.

53-54.name: HATE Magic. so much
53-54.info: +3 DMG Mod. Take 2d6 Vomit Damage if Reloaded.

55-56.name: OFF WITH THEIR HEADS!
55-56.info: Roll %s. 95%+: the Enemy's head falls off.

59-60.name: Super easy, barely an inconvenience
59-60.info: Automatically pass the first Check each day.

61-62.name: Hold onto your butts.
61-62.info: When fired, the wielder and targets Hit are Knocked Back 2 squares.

65-66.name: / don't want this isolation.
65-66.info: Won't fire unless adjacent to an ally or target.

67-68.name: TUFF with two Fs
67-68.info: Prevents the first 5 Health Damage each turn.

69-70.name: Unlikely Maths
69-70.info: Roll an extra die of each type rolled during an Attack and take the highest result(s).

71-72.name: Gravity's Rainbow
71-72.info: First Attack against a Badass target always deals max Damage.

73-74.name: Let's do this one last time
73-74.info: Shoots webs that reduce target's Movement to 0 for 1 turn.

75-76.name: BIP!
75-76.info: Once per encounter, the wielder can run into squares with an Enemy, Knocking them Back 1 square.

77-78.name: The Heaviest Matter of the Universe
77-78.info: The wielder and targets Hit cannot take Movement Actions while equipped.

79-80.name: GREEN FLAME
79-80.info: Shoots burst of green flames while firing. dealing 2d6 Incendiary Damage to adjacent targets.

81-82.name: More like Bore Ragnarok!
81-82.info: Gain 1 Badass Token after a successful Talk Check while equipped.

85-86.name: Let's boo-boo.
85-86.info: Gain Extra Movement after drinking a potion while equipped.

87-88.name: Mmm Whatcha Say.
87-88.info: Gain a Ranged Attack if an Enemy is talking before an encounter.

89-90.name: Here Comes the FunCooker
89-90.info: When this gun scores a Crit, the Enemy suffers a miniature combustion, dealing 1d12 Explosive Damage to itself and all adjacent squares.

91-92.name: Overwhelming strength is boring.
91-92.info: -6 Initiative. The first non-Badass, non- boss Enemy that is Melee Attacked dies instantly (1/day).

93-94.name: Stop talking, / will win. It's what heroes do.
93-94.info: Gun fires explosives that deal +3d6 Damage to all adjacent squares.

95-96.name: Richer and cleverer than everyone else!
95-96.info: Add 10 gold per Loot Pile when rolling for Enemy Drops.

97-98.name: METAL WILL DESTROY ALL EVIL!
97-98.info: Allies get +2 ACC Mod each turn you perform a Melee Attack.

99-100.name: Life is a conundrum of esoterica.
99-100.info: Gain 2 Badass Tokens the first time you roll for a Trauma each day.
